summary: Unjustly accused of robbing the train he was riding home, Bill Doolin re-joins his old gang, participates in other robberies and becomes a wanted outlaw.
cast: Audie Murphy|Beverly Tyler|James Best|Yvette Duguay|John Hudson|Hugh O'Brian|Roy Roberts|David Bauer|Noah Beery Jr.|Leif Erickson|John Hubbard|Frank Silvera|Carl Andre|Emile Avery|Joe Bailey|Eugene Baxter|Stanley Blystone|John Bromfield|Rand Brooks|Wheaton Chambers|Martin Cichy|Tristram Coffin|John Davidson|Charles Delaney|Eddie Dew|Richard Farmer|Frank Ferguson|Clem Fuller|Richard Garland|Tim Graham|Chuck Hamilton|Suzette Harbin|Harry Harvey|Tom Hubbard|Jack Ingram|Ethan Laidlaw|Rory Mallinson|Garnett Marks|William Marks|Philo McCullough|Forbes Murray|Gregg Palmer|Eddie Parker|William Reynolds|Ann Robinson|Elizabeth Root|David Sharpe|Charles Sherlock|Brick Sullivan|Blaine Turner|Dusty Walker|Paul Weber
title: Cimarron Kid
